name: Online Meetings
info: Conduct online meetings with ease and convenience. Collaborate with team members, clients, or partners from anywhere in the world. Share presentations, discuss projects, and make decisions in real-time.

name: Video Conferencing
info: Engage in face-to-face video conferences with participants. Seamlessly connect with colleagues and clients through high-quality video calls. Enhance communication and build relationships.

name: Screen Sharing
info: Easily share your screen with participants to showcase presentations, documents, or software. Collaborate visually by giving others a view of your screen. Perfect for demos and training sessions.

name: Record meetings
info: Record meetings for later reference or sharing with those who couldn't attend. Capture valuable discussions, presentations, and insights. Maintain an archive of past meetings.

name: Virtual Events
info: Host virtual events and conferences with a large number of attendees. Deliver keynote speeches, panel discussions, and networking opportunities in a virtual environment. Reach a global audience.

name: Webinars
info: Deliver webinars and informational sessions to a global audience. Educate, engage, and interact with participants through live web broadcasts. Share knowledge and expertise.

name: Team Chat
info: Facilitate team communication through real-time chat discussions. Share ideas, updates, and files instantly with team members. Keep everyone in sync and streamline collaboration.

name: File Sharing
info: Effortlessly share files and documents during meetings and discussions. Upload, share, and access files within the online meeting platform. Collaborate more effectively.
